name: Slalom Speciale
overview: A game of the Amiga Games Pack created by Luca Carminati of his Amiga games created from 1993 to 1998. This skiing game was originally created in 1993 with revisions in 1995 and 1997. In it you ski around the flags on the way to the finish line and try to get the best time possible, with penalties for missed flags, it supports up to 8 players.
